profile.title: Profile
profile.description: This is the profile that will be displayed on your profile.
profile.username_description: This is the username that will be displayed on your profile.
profile.email_description: This is the email that will be displayed on your profile.
profile.password_description: This is the password that will be used to log in to your account.
profile.confirm_password_description: This is the password that will be used to confirm your password.
profile.email_options_description: This is the email options that will be displayed on your profile.
profile.urls_description: This is the urls that will be displayed on your profile.
profile.bio_description: This is the bio that will be displayed on your profile.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the appearance of the app. Automatically switch between day and night themes.
appearance.select_font_description: Select the font for the app.
appearance.theme_description: This is the theme that will be displayed on your profile.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: This is the notifications that will be displayed on your profile.

mobile_settings.use_different: Use different settings for my mobile devices
mobile_settings.description: You can manage your mobile notifications on the mobile settings.

notifications.update_notifications_description: This is the update notifications that will be displayed on your profile.
notifications.update_notifications_description_2: You can manage your mobile notifications on the mobile settings page.
notifications.update_notifications_description_3: You can manage your mobile notifications on the mobile settings page.

display.title: Display
display.description: Turn items on or off to control what's displayed in the app.

sidebar.title: Sidebar
sidebar.description: Turn items on or off to control what's displayed in the app.

account.title: Account
account.name: Name
account.name_description: This is your public display name.
account.dob_description: Your date of birth is used to calculate your age.
account.language_description: This is the language that will be used in the application.
